pullRequest.title: Two talon bugs
pullRequest.bodyText:
This fixes two bugs with loading and validating mechs with talons:

Superheavies only require one slot in each leg for talons.
During post-load init, anything that is not a biped or quad is treated as a non-mech, which results in tripod mechs with talons throwing an EntityLoadingException.

Fixes MegaMek/megameklab#844

commit.message: Fix slot cost for superheavies in talon validation
Handle tripods with talons correctly in post-load init
